co.cask.coopr.store.cluster

Interface ClusterStoreView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReadOnlyClusterStoreView
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClusterStore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseSQLClusterStoreView, SQLAdminClusterStoreView, SQLClusterStore, SQLSystemClusterStoreView, SQLUserClusterStoreView

    public interface ClusterStoreView
extends ReadOnlyClusterStoreView
    A view of the cluster store as seen by a given account.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteCluster(String clusterId)
      Delete the cluster that has the given id.
      void writeCluster(Cluster cluster)
      Write a cluster to the store using its id.

        Write a cluster to the store using its id.

        Throws:
